bug.author: kazunarikudo
bug.summary: Harvester tries to control TLParamsLocked even if the device follows SFNC < 2.0
bug.description:
Describe the bug TLParamsLocked has been a mandatory feature since SFNC 2.0 but Harvester tries to control it even if the device follows SFNC < 2.0. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Prepare a device which follows SFNC < 2.0. Start image acquisition. See error.
Expected behavior Harvester must not control TLParamsLocked if a target device follows SFNC < 2.0. Additional context None.
